article_title: Retail groups urge 40 hour full time definition in ACA
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Several retail groups this week renewed their calls for changes in the definition of “full time” for the purposes of the Affordable Care Act.
article_metadata.title: Retail groups urge 40-hour full-time definition in ACA

og.description: Several retail groups, including Food Marketing Institute and National Grocers Association, this week renewed their calls for changes in the definition of “full time” for the purposes of the Affordable Care Act.
og.title: Retail groups urge 40-hour full-time definition in ACA

twitter.description: Several retail groups, including Food Marketing Institute and National Grocers Association, this week renewed their calls for changes in the definition of “full time” for the purposes of the Affordable Care Act.
twitter.title: Retail groups urge 40-hour full-time definition in ACA

article_metadata.keywords: Christine Pollack, National Retail Federation, Food Marketing Institute, National Grocers Association, Affordable Care Act, health care reform, Peter Larkin, Latest News, Retail & Financial, Government
